name: Hampton Inn Pensacola Airport (Cordova Mall Area)

reviews.text: Service at this hotel was "Outstanding".. I stay at hotels all the time & would definitely stay here again if in the area..
reviews.title: Highly Recommend

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We could find nothing to complain about during our 3-night stay. We were a little hesitant because it's right at the entrance to the airport, but we heard maybe three or four planes while we were there. (The flight pattern must be in the other direction.) Upon check-in, we were upgraded from a room to a suite - which was a pleasant surprise. Everything was in tip-top shape, and we had the very sufficient complimentary breakfast every morning. A newspaper was delivered outside our door each morning, too. In our opinion, the rate was very reasonable - especially considering that we stayed in a suite, not just a room. This location is perfect - within a couple of blocks of shopping and dining, about 10 minutes from Downtown, about 20 minutes from the beach, and right at the airport (if that's something you would need to use). The hotel personnel were very courteous and friendly. If I had to list one inconvenience, it would be that the elevators are all the way at the back of the hotel, and our suite was all the way at the front of the hotel when we got off the elevator! All in all, though, it was a wonderful stay.
reviews.title: All that they promised - and more.

reviews.text: If you are looking for a hotel near the airport this one works. It is pretty standard Hampton fare. My room had a stand up shower (no bath) and I wasn't told in advance. I don't care but if you want or need a tub make sure you ask. The breakfast is pretty sparse - especially for an airport hotel charging $130/night. Staff are quite good - knowledgable of the area, friendly and they speak English.
reviews.title: across the street from the airport
perfect stay!!!
reviews.text: My wife and i live only 1 hour away from this hotel and we have booked it now 3 times over the past year just to get away from our home for a "mini vacation" over a weekend. from the absolutely spotless housekeeping, helpful staff, location in the city, and VERY Comfy beds this hotel ranks high on my list of favorite hotels.....iv even stayed at some hotels for $400 a night that were not at the level of pleasure this hotel is at. im writing this review now because i was looking up the phone number so we can can stay there tonight.

Stayed here on business for two nights in June 08. While the bed is the standard (great) bed that Hampton Inns all have, the rest of the furniture and amenities in the room could have used updating... old desk with a small wooden chair, TV on it's way out, wall unit AC that was VERY loud (and not terribly efficient). All of that could have been overlooked had it not been for the complete lack of working internet access, and the inability of the tech support staff to fix the problem. I know, the hotel isn't an ISP, but when I travel for business, I have an expectation that the property will deliver on the "free internet" it boasts. Thankfully, there was a Panera around the corner and I was able to get some work done. To the staff's credit, they refunded me one night (without prompting), and were friendly, courteous and apologetic.
reviews.title: Stay for the convenient location, but not the internet access

reviews.text: I stayed in this hotel several years ago, and returned this trip because their employees were great then. If anything, they're even better now! This is a typical Hampton Inn, with a good hot breakfast available at convenient times. Nice business center, fitness center and attractive pool area (it was too cool to take a dip, so don't ask!). Location is close to the airport, a great mall, a restaurant center, and not all that far from the Pensacola NAS or Pensacola Beach. Great place for business travellers or families.
reviews.title: Service-oriented hotel - convenient location

reviews.text: We booked 2 rooms the night before we took an early flight home, location is just outside the airport. The hotel has been recently updated, rooms clean and comfortable - a bit small, but the other stuff is far more important. Hotel staff is the best ever! We arrived early so they held our luggage so we could return the rental car and be shuttled from the airport to the nearby mall then back to the hotel later. Manager's reception was very nice. We received a ride to the airport just before 4am along with coffee and a bagged breakfast to go.
reviews.title: Best customer service ever

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed here for one night as part of a coach tour. It was lovely to arrive at our hotel after the afternoon on the beach and go to our lovely clean airy room.
reviews.title: Excellent quality hotel

reviews.text: It is a very modern hotel. Our room was large with a kingsize bed, sofa, fridge, flat screen TV and best of all a large walk in shower, with a great water force. We really enjoyed the complimentary breakfast, which met all our requirements.
reviews.title: One of the Best Hampton Inns

reviews.text: We ate at the Bonefish Grill just around the corner from the hotel which was really excellent. This chain does not exist to my knowledge in the UK as yet (Certainly not in Bradford). I hope it comes our way soon!
reviews.title: Very Clean & Nice Staff!

reviews.text: Great hotel, with an awesome breakfast, free newspaper, right across street from airport. TGIFridays and Hooters just a few blocks away. Staff very helpful, nice business center. Great rooms, very spacious, king size bed very comfortable
reviews.title: Excellent experience
Wonderful stay!
reviews.text: The Hampton Inn Pensacola Airport was wonderful! I stayed there one night, Wednesday, March 22 2006. Room rate (military) was $99.00 + tax. I didn't know it when I checked in, but they have a "customer appreciation" reception every Wednesday evening in the lobby with complimentary cocktails, sodas and hors d'oeuvres. The staff really was nice and goes out of their way to be helpful. The rooms are clean and comfortable. I will definitely stay here again!
I stayed one night at this hotel in May 2005. The shuttle picked me up at the airport promptly. Check-in was quick and easy. The room was clean and comfortable.
reviews.title: Fantastic Hotel, Great Staff!

reviews.text: The night I was there, the Manager had a reception in the lobby from 5pm to 7pm with free wine, beer, colas and snack foods. This was a nice touch.
reviews.title: Great place
Clean and efficient
reviews.text: I would certainly reccommend this hotel for business travelers.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: As a Hilton Honors Silver member, we usually try to stay in hotels associated with that chain. After our experience with Hampton Inn Pensacola Airport, we will have to rethink that. We stayed Sep 29, 2010 in Room 307. When we entered the room, there was a strange buzzing sound. On investigation, it turned out to be an electric ozone 'odor eater' type of machine sitting on the floor next to the bed. We called the front desk & maintenance came & took it away. When we looked around the room, it was obvious that they were in the middle of redecoration.
reviews.title: Room wasn't ready to be occupied. Can't believe they were THAT full!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: White ceiling paint was 2" down the wall [so they hadn't repainted the walls yet].
reviews.title: Great location!

reviews.text: The ceiling in the entry looked like it had been recently sprayed [poorly] because it had a stripe effect with old & new white paint.
reviews.title: Expect the unexpected!

reviews.text: The top of the TV and desk, even the bedside lamp & light bulb were covered with dust & white ceiling Spackle bits.
reviews.title: An Accomodation Goldmine

reviews.text: There was no edging strip between the tile & the rug, so the rug was frayed & unravelling.
reviews.title: Good enough
Great Employees and Friendly
reviews.text: I have stayed there many times. The employees have always made me feel right at home. Very friendly service. Clean comfortable rooms with a great manager and assistant managers. I would not stay anywhere else.

We arrived at the Hampton Inn and was greeted by friendly workers. We were there for only 1 night but would recommend weeks! I really enjoyed the comfortable beds, snack center, and breakfast! Clean, neat, and cozy. What I am definitely looking for!
reviews.title: Amazing Stay!

reviews.text: We stay at the Hampton Inn near Pensacola Airport for long weekends several times each year. This time were there for the Blue Angels, and we had a room that had been completely renovated. The furnishings were very nice and I loved the leather ottoman/coffee table. The beds were very comfortable, and the bathroom was very well done with gorgeous granite counter tops. They also had new flat screen TVs, carpet, you name it - everything was was completely redone. Cool artwork too!
reviews.title: Recently Remodeled Rooms

reviews.text: This hotel is very close to restaurants, the mall, Sacred Heart Hospital, Pensacola Junior College and the airport. It's about 15 minutes from downtown and 20 minutes from Pensacola Beach. Don't miss going to Joe Patti's Seafood downtown, the Naval Air Station, and of course the beautiful beaches.
reviews.title: A True Gem

reviews.text: Breakfast was good, with waffles, bagels, cereal, fruit, and things like that. There was plenty of variety. We also enjoyed the swimming pool after a long day at the beach. We didn't use the gym, so I can't comment on that.
reviews.title: Great place to stay for business!

reviews.text: We received excellent customer service and fast check in from the front desk. Housekeeping was well maintained, and we didn't have a single issue that needed correction. Overall, this is a great value and a nice property that is very conveniently located.
reviews.title: LOCATION SERVICE LOCATION

aka: Hampton Inn Pensacola Airport (Cordova Mall Area) Hotel Pensacola
